name: MiDESign & Marketing Consultancy
description:
A full service DESign and Marketing consultancy.
We specialize in brand commercialization, whether through printed material design and production, or electronically via the web. 
We also provide a product design service, help with SWOT analysis and evaluation, marketing plan creation and promotion implementation. Effectively we strive to become an integral part of your own design and marketing team.  We are committed to ensuring you achieve your goals.
